Text: i burned this game but couldnt get it to work.....once i hit start the load wants to load but then fails after the intro

Burned at 2X (my burner's slowest speed). The iso burned fine, but about 2/3 through the game, there was an error that the disc was unreadable. I'm guessing this is no good. I could waste another disc, but I'll wait until someone can confirm that they have burned and played this all the way through.
As an update, I burned the iso again, and it works just fine, so far.
